subject: Odd Side Effect
body:
I have no problem with an erections but they do not last as long as when I was 40 or so. Viagra gets me erect faster and I stay erect longer after orgasms so we can still play. Round two also arrives much sooner and I am hard quicker and longer. No side effects I know of other than the fact that sex is much improved. The effects last 3 or 4 hours, and it takes 30 to 45 minutes to kick in. 25 or 50 mg tabs work the same for me, no difference. Go for it...
Carl Wright.
You can find it here
